extractErrorPayload(bytes).details: Strips out the revert message to extract the payload ErrorMsg(bytes errorMessage) - ('0x' + 32 bytes) * 2 = 64 bytes

params._err: The bytes array to extract the error payload from

extractErrorPayload(bytes).notice: Extracts the error payload from a bytes arrayThis function is called by the HyperLiquidComposer contract

documentation.text:
@dev Valid compose message lengths for the HyperLiquidComposer - can be abi.encodePacked(address) or abi.encode(address)
 @dev If we are in abi.encodePacked(address) mode, the length is 20 bytes because addresses are 20 bytes
@dev If we are in abi.encode(address) mode, the length is 32 bytes

statements.documentation: @dev _amount / scale is guaranteed to be smaller than 2 ** 64
